title: Love Island's Belle Hassan sizzles in PVC leggings at early Halloween event
text:
She recently fuelled speculation she's reunited with her ex-boyfriend Anton Danyluk.

And Belle Hassan ensured all eyes on her as she attended Madame Tussauds London's Tales from The Chamber event on Thursday evening.

The Love Island star, 21, accentuated her curves in a clingy black vest and PVC leggings as she appeared spooked out by a creepy staff member at the pre-Halloween event.

Sizzling: Belle Hassan attended Madame Tussauds London's Tales from The Chamber event on Thursday evening, after sparking reunion rumours with ex Anton Danyluk

Maintaining her vampy look, the TV personality boosted her frame in leather thigh-high boots and a sleek choker.

The reality star styled her blonde tresses in a straight fashion, while her radiant complexion was highlighted with matte foundation, fluttery false lashes and nude lipgloss.

Bromley native Belle was in good company as she joined the likes of ex-TOWIE star Jess Wright and singer Tallia Storm.

Animated: The Love Island star, 21, accentuated her curves in a clingy black vest and PVC leggings as she appeared spooked out by a creepy staff member at the pre-Halloween event

All-black look: Maintaining her vampy look, the TV personality accessorised with a sleek choker

Go away! Wrapping up warm in a padded jacket, the reality star looked like she wanted the scary event to end as she was approached by a crew member

The aspiring actress' outing comes after Scottish gym owner Anton, 24, revealed he's 'seeing' Belle again, weeks after their split.

On their long-distance romance, he told The Sun on Wednesday: 'I wouldn't say we are back together, the same problems still stand. It has been really hard to see each other - we came out of the villa and I've been in a different city every day.

'It is complicated, we are seeing each other when we can but it isn't official.

Starry: Bromley native Belle was in good company as she joined the likes of ex-TOWIE star Jess Wright (L) and singer Tallia Storm (R)

Scared: The fitness enthusiast put on an animated display at the event

In her element: The Celebs Go Dating star was in the zone as she grinned from ear-to-ear among the scary staff

'We are both so busy but we still like each other so we will just have to see what happens in the future', he added.

They first sparked rumours they'd reunited on a night out with Anna Vakili. The couple first struck up a romance while they were taking part in the reality series but split up just weeks after they left the villa.

But the pair looked cosy as they posed for a snap at Beiruit Nights in London alongside pharmacist Anna, 29.
